properties.name: SinAbad area, Jiroft County, Kerman Province, Iran
properties.description:
SinAbad area, Jiroft County, Kerman Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

In the Kerman magmatic belt within the Urumieh–Dokhtar magmatic belt in Iran. In the argillic alteration zone of the SinAbad area of the Urumieh–Dokhtar magmatic belt (Iran), Mg-rich, Fe-poor chlorites, which crystallised at temperatures between 160 °C...
